name: linkedin-mcp-server
description: Connect Claude to LinkedIn for profiles, companies, and job details
long_description:
# LinkedIn MCP Server

Connect Claude to your LinkedIn account. Access profiles, companies, and job postings through a Docker container on your machine.

## Features
- **Profile Access**: Get detailed LinkedIn profile information including work history, education, and skills
- **Company Profiles**: Extract comprehensive company information and details
- **Job Details**: Retrieve job posting information from LinkedIn URLs
- **Job Search**: Search for jobs with keywords and location filters

## First-Time Setup

### 1. Pre-pull Docker Image (Required)
Run this command first to avoid connection timeouts:
```
docker pull stickerdaniel/linkedin-mcp-server:3.0.0

tools.name: get_person_profile
tools.description: Get detailed information from a LinkedIn profile including work history, education, skills, and connections

tools.name: get_company_profile
tools.description: Extract comprehensive company information and details

tools.name: get_job_details
tools.description: Retrieve specific job posting details using LinkedIn job IDs

tools.name: search_jobs
tools.description: Search for jobs with filters like keywords and location

tools.name: close_session
tools.description: Properly close browser session and clean up resources
